name: G3 Sector
description:
The goal of this project was to go through the formal design process of identifying the element of fun and gamer motivation I wanted my game to capture. I created a Game Design Document to outline the core gameplay features and systems necessary to achieve this goal. I utilized a DevLog to chronicle the development process and to ensure that the scope was kept in check. 

Please give G3 Sector a shot and be sure to leave feedback via the comment section!
